data.eml:eml: New species and records of Ischnosoma Stephens (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Tachyporinae) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kocian, Matúš, Schülke, Michael (2016): New species and records of Ischnosoma Stephens (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Tachyporinae) from China. Zootaxa 4105 (3): 201-242, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4105.3.1
